name: The Vox
description:
Hello everyone. I am the indie developer of this game.

Tae Vox is a multiplayer and single player sandbox game. This game is under development, so there will be updates with new features. If you have any ideas what you can add to this game, write in the comments. We will develop this game together.

Controls :

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Run

Left mouse button - Destroy block

Right mouse button - Add block

E - open inventory in game

Tab - open menu in game

Enter - Open/Send chat
